content: **about the pattern free pattern ** pope basic drop shoulder sweater is a relaxed wardrobe staple designed to keep you company every day i ve used this construction in many of my designs and it continues to be one of my favorites because it offers a comfortable fit and is incredibly versatile for your closet it s the kind of sweater you ll want to knit in all your favorite colors and make again and again it s worked from the top down starting with a provisional cast-on you begin by knitting the back then pick up stitches to work the front pieces down to the underarm from there the body is joined and worked in the round the sleeves are picked up and knit in the round as well so there s no seaming involved **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 recommended ease 10 cm- 15 cm / 4 6 of positive
